table.caption: Table 90 – Default Decode Arrays
head: Colour Space
Decode Array
rows: [ 0 100 amin amax bmin bmax ] where amin , amax , bmin , and bmax correspond to the values in the Range array of the image’s colour space
Same as the value of Range in the ICC profile of the image’s colour space
[ 0.0 1.0 0.0 1.0 … 0.0 1.0 ] (one pair of elements for each colour component)
